metadata.dataset_name: Multi-Agent GraphRAG Benchmark Dataset - Search Type Comparison
metadata.description: Benchmark queries for evaluating multi-agent RAG systems across different search types (vector, graph, hybrid)

test_queries.query: What are the main advantages of using knowledge graphs in RAG systems?
expected_papers: Research on risk decision-making generation method
A Multi-Agent and GraphRAG-Based Framework for Hydraulic Projects
ground_truth_claims: KGs improve retrieval precision through structured relations
Graph databases like Neo4j support efficient traversal
